## Block.getIcon() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
getIcon<T extends IIcon>(type: IconType<T> | string): T | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [IconType](./blockly.icons.icontype.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; \| string | The type of the icon to retrieve. Prefer passing an <code>IconType</code> for proper type checking when using typescript. |

**Returns:**

T \| undefined

The icon with the given type if it exists on the block, undefined otherwise.
